arts.sum: Callum Styles' red card added insult to injury for West Brom on Good Friday as goals from Jack Rudoni and Matt Grimes sealed a miserable 2-0 away defeat against Coventry. That result was a brutal blow...

Plymouth were dealt a sickening blow on Good Friday as a controversial late penalty denied the Pilgrims a point against play-off contenders Middlesbrough. Defeats for Derby and Cardiff have kept Miron...

arts.ttl: What Frank Lampard liked most about Coventry City's 'complete' performance against West Brom
arts.sum: Frank Lampard was delighted with what he described as a “complete” first half performance that set his Coventry City side on track for a huge three points against play-off rivals West Bromwich Albion. “And then in the second half, in the circumstances, we got our early goal and then they got a red card but they are good footballing team and can handle ten players, to a degree, and stay on the ball a bit.

arts.ttl: 'Absolutely nothing' - West Brom slated as Coventry City deliver play-off hammer blow - Birmingham Live
arts.sum: “Cov got that first goal and probably against the run of play really, because I thought West Brom started the game a lot better. Ex-Aston Villa star Lee Hendrie has criticised West Brom's display in their loss to play-off rivals Coventry City - and dismissed their chances of finishing in the top six.

arts.ttl: Coventry take significant step towards the play-offs with West Brom win
arts.sum: Coventry took a huge step in the race for the Sky Bet Championship play-off places after beating 10-player West Brom 2-0 in front of a record-breaking crowd at the CBS Arena.

arts.ttl: Coventry City player ratings after 2-0 win over West Brom
arts.sum: Liam Kitching was denied by a good save from the keeper as City dominated the first half, looking to extend their lead on a day when Jay Dasilva and Rudoni stood out. Goals from Jack Rudoni and Matt Grimes early in each half gave Coventry City a huge three points against play-off rivals West Bromwich Albion who were reduced to ten men in front of a record breaking crowd at the CBS Arena.

arts.ttl: Coventry take a significant step towards the play-offs with West Brom win
arts.sum: The Sky Blues are in fine form.

arts.ttl: Wallace fit: West Brom team news and predicted XI to face Coventry City
arts.sum: The latest West Brom team news as Tony Mowbray's side gear up to face Coventry City in the Championship on Good Friday. The post Wallace fit: West Brom team news and predicted XI to face Coventry City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Frank Lampard reveals Tony Mowbray chat and sets Coventry City a West Brom challenge
arts.sum: Speaking about Albion, Lampard remarked: "I think West Brom are a very good team and I have watched a lot of them in preparation for this game," following on from their recent 2-1 victory at The Hawthorns against Watford. Frank Lampard is optimistic that Coventry City's substantial Good Friday turnout at the CBS Arena will spur his squad on against play-off competitors West Bromwich Albion.

arts.ttl: Championship: Predictions for all 12 games on Friday
arts.sum: The Easter weekend double header in the Championship usually has major repercussions at both ends of the table and Tom McGarry is on hand to provide a score prediction for all 12 games in the second tier on Good Friday.
